Title: Whole unit at Toa Payoh Hub - From Nov 2023
Location: 177 Toa Payoh Central Toa Payoh, Central Singapore
Description:
'Hi, I'm Sue, a local Catholic owner. I'm renting out a wonderful and blessed house, which is in the heart of Toa Payoh Hub.

The 2 bedrooms are fully furnished (with a built-in wardrobe for storage in the room). 

My house is just a short walk to Toa Payoh MRT Station and Bus Interchange. All the conveniences are right at the doorsteps -- retails shops, restaurants, hairdressers, clinics, banks, supermarkets and quirky watering holes. 

Moreover, there're other public facilities nearby that one could enjoy from, like: the Swimming Complex, Sports Stadium, Library, SAFRA and the Toa Payoh garden. 

I sincerely welcome anyone who are looking for a honest and fair deal between us to check out the house. Please message me with the following info: 
1. Nationality. 
2. Race. 
3. Work Status (Permanent/E-Pass/S-Pass/WP).

God bless you.'

Title: SkyPark @ Somerset, Bungalow in the Sky Duplex with Sky Garden 4bedrooms
Description:
'Please Call / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 
Sam Ong for viewing. Thanks. 

PropNex Associate Division Director 
Cea Reg : R016315I Mobile / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 


SkyPark @ Somerset, 
22 St Thomas Walk
4+1 bedrooms, 3,347sqft High floor,
Bungalow in the Sky Duplex layout, 800sqft Sky Garden on every floor, 
Private Balcony with Jacuzzi, 
individual unit on each floor, 
High ceiling, Windy. 

Partial Furnished, 
asking $28k (Subject to GST)
Fully furnished can be arranged.
Available 23rd Oct 23
(Sample photos as shown) 

Uncover the beauty of luxury living at its height. Luxurious way of living in a spacious duplex home, high above ground, surrounded by lush gardens of green and a backdrop of blue sky. 

This 32 storey development, 
comprising of 56 apartments, 
will take your breath away every day with a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding city-view. 
A spacious sky terrace, a glass passenger lift, 
a 40-metre swimming pool and a cigar terrace are fine touches to your abode, 
which has a ceiling height of six-metres. 

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ... 

The intention was to design houses in a residential tower. Experiencing the 'gardens' from within the apartment, the space does actually create a "grounded" sensation, if not for the city skyline beyond. The jury was very impressed by the way in which the architect was able to integrate these design strategies successfully to create meaningful spaces within a coherent piece of architecture. 

Facilities, 
40m Lap pool 
Gym 
BBQ area 
Function room 
24hrs security 
Golf bag storage '

Title: SkyPark @ Somerset, Bungalow in the Sky Duplex with Sky Garden 4bedrooms
Description:
'Please Call / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 
Sam Ong for viewing. Thanks. 

PropNex Associate Division Director 
Cea Reg : R016315I Mobile / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 


SkyPark @ Somerset, 
22 St Thomas Walk
4+1 bedrooms, 3,347sqft High floor,
Bungalow in the Sky Duplex layout, 800sqft Sky Garden on every floor, 
Private Balcony with Jacuzzi, 
individual unit on each floor, 
High ceiling, Windy. 

Partial Furnished, 
asking $28k (Subject to GST)
Fully furnished can be arranged.
Available 23rd Oct 23
(Sample photos as shown) 

Uncover the beauty of luxury living at its height. Luxurious way of living in a spacious duplex home, high above ground, surrounded by lush gardens of green and a backdrop of blue sky. 

This 32 storey development, 
comprising of 56 apartments, 
will take your breath away every day with a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding city-view. 
A spacious sky terrace, a glass passenger lift, 
a 40-metre swimming pool and a cigar terrace are fine touches to your abode, 
which has a ceiling height of six-metres. 

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ... 

The intention was to design houses in a residential tower. Experiencing the 'gardens' from within the apartment, the space does actually create a "grounded" sensation, if not for the city skyline beyond. The jury was very impressed by the way in which the architect was able to integrate these design strategies successfully to create meaningful spaces within a coherent piece of architecture. 

Facilities, 
40m Lap pool 
Gym 
BBQ area 
Function room 
24hrs security 
Golf bag storage '

Description:
'Please Call / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 
Sam Ong for viewing. Thanks. 

PropNex Associate Division Director 
Cea Reg : R016315I Mobile / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 


SkyPark @ Somerset,

4+1 bedrooms, 3,347sqft High floor,
Bungalow in the Sky Duplex layout, 800sqft Sky Garden on every floor, 
Private Balcony with Jacuzzi, 
individual unit on each floor, 
High ceiling, Windy. 

Partial Furnished, 
asking $28k (Subject to GST)
Fully furnished can be arranged.
Available 23rd Oct 23
(Sample photos as shown) 

Uncover the beauty of luxury living at its height. Luxurious way of living in a spacious duplex home, high above ground, surrounded by lush gardens of green and a backdrop of blue sky. 

This 32 storey development, 
comprising of 56 apartments, 
will take your breath away every day with a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding city-view. 
A spacious sky terrace, a glass passenger lift, 
a 40-metre swimming pool and a cigar terrace are fine touches to your abode, 
which has a ceiling height of six-metres. 

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ... 

The intention was to design houses in a residential tower. Experiencing the 'gardens' from within the apartment, the space does actually create a "grounded" sensation, if not for the city skyline beyond. The jury was very impressed by the way in which the architect was able to integrate these design strategies successfully to create meaningful spaces within a coherent piece of architecture. 

Facilities, 
40m Lap pool 
Gym 
BBQ area 
Function room 
24hrs security 
Golf bag storage '
